name: part_006
file: tmp_【#戌神ころね生誕祭2021】久しぶりの３Ｄライブ！？今年もいっぱいおめでとうをありがとう！【戌神ころね⧸ホロライブ】 [2l3i7MulCgs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Happy Halloween' by Inugami Korone.
Performance of the song 'Happy Synthesizer' by Inugami Korone.

subtitles.original:
Happy Halloween
作詞・作曲 Junky
subtitles.english:
Happy Halloween
Lyrics & Composition: Junky

subtitles.original: 日も暮れ 暗くなりそうだから
subtitles.english: The sun is setting and it's getting dark,

subtitles.original: 出ちゃってもいいかしら
subtitles.english: So is it okay if I come out?

subtitles.original: ちょっとね 魔法にかけられた
subtitles.english: Just a little, I've been put under a spell

subtitles.original: キミのお菓子から食べちゃおう
subtitles.english: By your sweets, so I'll start eating them!

subtitles.original: きっと 霧が濃くなるから
subtitles.english: The fog will surely get thicker,

subtitles.original: みんな集まるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if everyone will gather?

subtitles.original: じっと 甘いもの我慢した
subtitles.english: I've been patiently resisting sweets

subtitles.original: ご褒美は ほら 一つ二つ
subtitles.english: My reward is, look, one or two...

subtitles.original: 鐘の音 さあ 小さいオバケたち
subtitles.english: The sound of the bell—come now, little ghosts!

subtitles.original: 今日はお菓子をくれないなら
subtitles.english: If you won't give me any candy today,

subtitles.original: 街の邪魔しに行こう
subtitles.english: I'll go and play tricks on the town!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: イタズラしちゃうぞ Ding-Dong-Dang
subtitles.english: I'm going to play a trick on you, Ding-Dong-Dang!

subtitles.original: あっちもこっちも トリック・オア・トリート
subtitles.english: Trick or treat here, there, and everywhere!

subtitles.original: キャンディはくれないの？
subtitles.english: Won't you give me any candy?

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: 大嫌いなカボチャもポッキー
subtitles.english: Even the hated pumpkins and Pocky...

subtitles.original: 疲れたジャックも踊るよ
subtitles.english: The tired Jack-o'-lantern will dance, too,

subtitles.original: 朝まで
subtitles.english: Until the morning!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: オバケの株だって上がっちゃう
subtitles.english: Even the ghosts' stock is rising!

subtitles.original: 今日は 街中 トリック・オア・トリート
subtitles.english: Today, the whole town is "Trick or Treat!"

subtitles.original: チョコも頂戴よ
subtitles.english: Give me some chocolate, too!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: 不思議な世界へようこそ
subtitles.english: Welcome to a mysterious world

subtitles.original: 疲れたジャックも歌うよ
subtitles.english: The tired Jack-o'-lantern will sing, too,

subtitles.original: Let's Trick or Treat
subtitles.english: Let's Trick or Treat!

subtitles.original: 紅い家なんて 庭先に
subtitles.english: To a red house, or just in the yard,

subtitles.original: トイレットペーパー ぐるぐるしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Let's wrap it up in toilet paper!

subtitles.original: 今夜はランタン 灯してるなら
subtitles.english: If you're lighting lanterns tonight,

subtitles.original: 甘いの頂戴 さあ
subtitles.english: Then give me something sweet, come on!

subtitles.original: Let's party night
subtitles.english: Let's party night!

subtitles.original: ほら だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Look, because it's Happy Halloween,

subtitles.original: 時計も回るよ チクタク
subtitles.english: The clock hands turn, tick-tock!

subtitles.original: あっちもこっちも トリック・オア・トリート
subtitles.english: Trick or treat here, there, and everywhere!

subtitles.original: 目もくらむ パンプキンパイ
subtitles.english: A dazzling pumpkin pie!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween,

subtitles.original: だから 夜更かししちゃうじゃない
subtitles.english: That's why we're staying up late, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 疲れたジャックも寝ないわ
subtitles.english: The tired Jack-o'-lantern won't sleep,

subtitles.original: 朝まで
subtitles.english: Until the morning!

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: だって Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Because it's Happy Halloween

subtitles.original: 今日は Happy Halloween
subtitles.english: Today is Happy Halloween!

subtitles.original: さあ Let's Trick or Treat
subtitles.english: Come on, Let's Trick or Treat!

subtitles.original: 赤いカボチャも 転がして
subtitles.english: Roll the red pumpkins, too,

subtitles.original: 朝まで 寝たくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to sleep until morning!

subtitles.original:
ハッピーシンセサイザ
作詞・作曲 BETTI
subtitles.english:
Happy Synthesizer
Lyrics & Composition: BETTI

subtitles.original: ハッピーシンセサイザ
subtitles.english: Happy Synthesizer

subtitles.original: 君の胸の奥まで
subtitles.english: To the depths of your heart,

subtitles.original: 届くような メロディ 奏でるよ
subtitles.english: I'll play a melody that reaches you

subtitles.original: 儚く散った 淡い片思い
subtitles.english: A fleeting, faint unrequited love,

subtitles.original: 笑い話だね 今となれば
subtitles.english: It's just a funny story now, looking back

subtitles.original: 見るもの全て 輝いて見えた
subtitles.english: Everything I saw looked radiant,

subtitles.original: あの日々は 綺麗に笑ってるよ
subtitles.english: Those days are smiling beautifully

subtitles.original: 我慢することだけ 覚えなきゃいけないの？
subtitles.english: Do I have to learn only how to endure?

subtitles.original: 「大人になって頂戴」言わなくていいよ
subtitles.english: You don't have to say "Become an adult, please"

subtitles.original: 知らないことばかり 知らないなんて言えなくて
subtitles.english: There were so many things I didn't know, and I couldn't say I didn't

subtitles.original: 大変
subtitles.english: It's tough...
